text: Iglesia de San Esteban Iglesia de San Esteban is a former Catholic church in Burgos, Spain, on the eastern perimeters of Burgos Castle. It was essentially built between the late thirteenth and early fourteenth century. It now houses the Museo del Retablo. ==References== Category:Roman Catholic churches in Burgos Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 14th century
title: San Esteban, Burgos
